A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I think this is easily in the top 4 Star Wars movie for me! Easily better than The Force Awakens. As a Star Wars fan\, R. Johnson did a lot of things right to move the franchise forward. Not sure if I liked the Canto Bight excursion/mission though. Could have been shorter. I thought the Luke Skywalker correct was PERFECTLY written! \n\nAnd no\, I don't work for Disney.
